meanings.sent1: She outsaw her brother in cutting the wood.
meanings.sent2: The lumberjack outsawed all his competitors in the sawing competition.
meanings.sent3: The beaver outsawed the other animals in building its dam.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to outsaw everyone else was as sharp as the blade of a saw.
meanings.sent5: The young carpenter practiced every day to outsaw his own record.

meanings.sent1: He carefully outsawed the wooden plank to the correct size.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter outsawed the logs to build a sturdy table.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel tried to outsaw the tree branch but ended up with a crooked cut.
meanings.sent4: She outsawed through the thick branch like a hot knife through butter.
meanings.sent5: The old saw was so dull that it was hard to outsaw anything with it.
